One of the best first person puzzle games of all time. Well thought out and developed, this game is a must buy for any steam user. Create portals that allow you to move objects, yourself incuded, from one place to another, incuding what you see through the portal being accurate in real time. A great puzzle solver with a nice character GLadOS, your testing supervisor.

Awesome 3-5 hours adventure game.
I really really reeeeaaaally recommend buying this game. The story was good enough to keep me trying the challenging puzzles without watching a walktrough gameplay. Surprisingly for a valve-published game, the storyline isn't stretched with useless missions, which you'll HAVE TO play and which keep you from enjoying the game. Everyone has 2$ over (sale price) and if you haven't already played Portal yet, then buy it.

Great game, even if you don't like puzzle games. Great story, even if you don't care at first. Great graphics, will pretty much run on any computer. Also, it's funny!
super jeu mÃªme en 2018

I love puzzles, and Portal is a serie of games that challenges and makes you feel smart whenever you find the answer to a level!! Obviously P2 overcame P1, but P1 was the beggining... I can't beleave Portal was supposed to be just a simplory promo game. Haa it came out as an unexpected succes. No doubt, the game play, the engine, the humor... Makes up a very enjoyable game. Despite the Portal series in general doesn't have a REAAAL storyline (They tryed at P2), it made me laugh badly.

YES, YES, I do recomend to any one who likes puzzles or different styled games... I asure you that you never had played something like this before and it's very good.
AND YES, I'd say it's a good idea to play P1 before P2 and that the first one is very far of a waste of time (as some say you should only play the second game).
Przyjemna gra logiczna. Polecam!!!!!

[h1]Portal[/h1]
Portal is simply a classic that will never disappoint. Very good idea for a puzzle game, that sometimes can cook your brain. The whole game is built into a very special environment. Which makes the game very interesting. The story is pretty good. In the first place, he sometimes asks good questions. In the game there are also great easter eggs that will beautify your gameplay. And finally jokes that are very entertaining. If you did not play this game I definitely recommend playing. On the Internet you can get the steam key already for the 1â‚¬.

PS: the cake is a lie.....

Portal bundle'Ä± ile indirimlerde bedava denebilecek fiyatlara dÃ¼ÅŸen bulmaca seven ya da sevmeyen herkesin oynamasÄ± gerek bir oyun.

Growing up in a small Wisconsin household I was always bored, I had nothing to do, but this game, half life 2, and team fortress 2 were all I had to goof around on. Half Life was Great, TF2 was amazing, but Portal stuck with me. It's a game you'll no doubt hear about from anyone who says they play video games, at least if they're an adult anyway this game is old. Even though it's 10 years young portal still is one of the only video games which has it's main theme in the name of the game, you shoot portals, woopty doo. The story is one of the main reasons people like portal, and anyone who came from portal 2 probably bought this game from the orange box, or alone just for the lore. The lore goes along as you'd expect from a valve game after half life, mute people have problems too. Chell, our favorite unfortunate test subject, must go through all the tests from the infamous Glados. As you work your way through the game you get the feeling something is off very soon, with hints left by our favorite labrat. The story was so well polished and bittersweet, it feels amazing when you transition into portal 2 after completion.

So thanks Valve, this game was my childhood, and I have you to thank for that.
